scene.name: Whiteboard setup
scene.description: A whiteboard with existing text, an eraser, and a marker on the tray

task.name: Erase and write text
task.description: Clean the board using an eraser and write 'beingbeyond' with a marker
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will update the board. The goal is to erase the old text and write 'beingbeyond'.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要更新黑板内容。目标是擦掉旧的文字，然后写上“beingbeyond”。

subtasks.description: Execute the erasing and writing sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please clean the board and write the new word.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请擦干净黑板，并写下新单词。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the eraser from the tray.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：从托盘里拿起黑板擦。

steps.description: Erase the text on the board
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: wipe the board thoroughly to remove existing text.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：仔细擦拭黑板，清除原本的文字。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: place the eraser back on the tray.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：把黑板擦放回托盘。

steps.description: Pick up the marker and uncap it
steps.spoken_prompt: Step four: pick up the marker and remove the cap.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第四步：拿起记号笔，并拔掉笔盖。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step five: write the word 'beingbeyond' clearly on the board.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第五步：在黑板上清晰地写下“beingbeyond”。

steps.description: Recap the marker and put it back
steps.spoken_prompt: Step six: put the cap back on the marker and return it to the tray.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第六步：盖上笔盖，把记号笔放回托盘。

constraints.notes: Ensure the board is wiped clean before writing; writing must be legible; marker must be capped after use to prevent drying.
